title: Stalin: man and image

description: A documentary examining the image Stalin created by exploring the man, his rise to power and his place in history. Historical perspective is provided by use of classic film footage showing the 1917 Russian Revolution, Lenin, Trotsky and Stalin. Narrated by Henry Fonda. Suitable for upper secondary level.
